Description_lang: Reduces the mana cost of Drain Soul, Incinerate, and Shadow Bolt by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Reduces the mana cost of Drain Soul, Incinerate, and Shadow Bolt by 15%.
description_blz.es_MX: Reduce el costo de maná de Drenar alma, Incinerar y Descarga de las Sombras un 15%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 15% o custo de mana de Drenar Alma, Incinerar e Seta Sombria.
description_blz.de_DE: Verringert die Manakosten von 'Seelendieb', 'Verbrennen' und 'Schattenblitz' um 15%.
description_blz.en_GB: Reduces the mana cost of Drain Soul, Incinerate, and Shadow Bolt by 15%.
description_blz.es_ES: Reduce el coste de maná de Drenar alma, Incinerar y Descarga de las Sombras un 15%.
description_blz.fr_FR: Réduit le coût en mana de Drain d’âme, Incinérer et Trait de l’ombre de 15%.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il costo in mana di Dardo d'Ombra, Risucchio d'Anima e Incenerimento del 15%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Снижает стоимость "Похищения души", "Испепеления" и "Стрелы Тьмы" на 15%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 영혼 흡수, 소각, 어둠의 화살에 소비되는 마나가 15%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使吸取靈魂、燒盡和暗影箭的法力消耗降低15%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使吸取灵魂、烧尽和暗影箭的法力消耗降低15%。
